◆ process()

float bdsp::oscillator::OscWavetable::process ( )

Definition at line 28 of file OscWavetable.cpp.

29 {
30 // Perform interpolated table lookup at current read index
31 // to find output sample
32 const float y = lookup(idx);
33
34 // Increment current read index
35 idx += delta;
36
37 // Keep index from wrapping erroneously due to overflow
38 if (idx >= static_cast<float>(table_len - 1))
39 {
40 idx -= (float)table_len;
41 }
42
43 // Output
44 return y;
45 }

◆ lookup()

float bdsp::oscillator::OscWavetable::lookup ( float index)
private

Definition at line 52 of file OscWavetable.cpp.

53 {
54 // Split index into integer and fractional parts
55 const int idx_int = static_cast<int>(index);
56 const float idx_frac = index - (float)idx_int;
57
58 // Wrap indices
59 const int idx0 = idx_int % table_len;
60 const int idx1 = (idx_int + 1) % table_len;
61
62 // Read adjacent samples
63 const float x0 = wavetable[idx0];
64 const float x1 = wavetable[idx1];
65
66 // Interpolate to find output
67 const float y = bdsp::mappings::linear_norm(idx_frac, x0, x1);
68
69 return y;
70 }
